sources.title: Love On The Dole
sources.description: From IMDb; During the depression in England, a young lady from Lancashire decides to be a rich bookmaker's mistress, just to help the rest of her family who are unemployed. Stars: Deborah Kerr, Clifford Evans and George Carney

metadata.Plot: During the Depression in England, a young lady from Lancashire decides to be a rich bookmaker's mistress, just to help the rest of her unemployed family.
metadata.Writer: Walter Greenwood, Ronald Gow, Barbara K. Emary
metadata.Actors: Deborah Kerr, Clifford Evans, George Carney
